answerText: Lambda calculus[10] With this British computer scientist and cryptographer, Church created a thesis stating that all algorithmically computable functions can be computed on one of his namesake machines.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 3 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This system corresponds to natural deduction according to the Curry-Howard isomorphism. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this system commonly used in computability theory, developed by Alonzo Church. Its "simply typed" form is logically consistent, unlike the original which is subject to the Kleene-Rosser paradox.
